text: The Chile national under-17 football team represents Chile in youth international football completions. They have qualified for the FIFA U-17 World Cup five times with their best finish being third place in 1993. They hosted the 2015 FIFA U-17 World Cup on their home soil. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA Under-17 World Cup record=== FIFA U-17 World Cup record FIFA U-17 World Cup record FIFA U-17 World Cup
